metadata.effects: +4 Arcane,  reduces the HP recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears
Slightly reduces the FP cost of skills, Increases damage taken
Raises the potency of Azur's primeval current sorceries at the cost of  additional FP consumption.
Wearer's movement becomes silent, Rolls, jumping and walking make no noise
Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
Strengthens Aspects of the Crucible incantations
Slightly reduces the FP cost of incantations, Increases damage taken
Raises attack power when something nearby suffers from poison or rot
Greatly increases Intelligence at the cost of stamina and HP
Slightly reduces the FP cost of Sorceries, Increases damage taken
Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Cerulean Tears, but  increases damage taken.
Slightly increases the recovery effects of the Flask of Crimson Tears, but  increases damage taken.
Boosts the power of throwing pot items
Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced

metadata.location: - The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the     All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell,     Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the *Royal Capital* accessible     only after making significant progress in the story

- The entire Alberich's Set can be found in the main hall of the     Fortified manor in Leyndell, Royal Capital, near the Fortified Manor,     first floor Site of Grace. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- Dropped by Undead Soldiers
- Dropped by Undead Soldiers
- Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes     for   1500 Runes. Map Link.

- After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline, return to Primeval     Sorcerer Azur's location. *Azur's Glintstone Robe* will be on the floor     where Azur used to be, along with the rest of the set.
- Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.
- Dropped by Banished Knights

- Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will     eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set     with an altered version of the chest piece. See the location on the Elden     Ring Map here.
- Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical     Town in Consecrated Grounds. See map location.
- Drop from Blackflame Monks

- The entire Bloodhound Knight Set drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt.     Gelmir. Dropped by the *Bloodhound Knight* guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup.     The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight. See it on the Elden     Ring Map here.
- Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.
- Drop from Albinauric archers at Ordina, Liturgical Town.
- Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer     of the Briar in The Shaded Castle
- Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano     Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Map Link

- Found in a chest behind Sorceress Sellen, in Ruined Cellar, Post Town     Remains.    - You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy    - To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to     the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section,     specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the     gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform     that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of     Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick     up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.
- Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal. It     costs 1500 Runes. Map Link.
- Dropped by Soldiers
- Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,500     Runes. Map Link.
- Can be found at Inner Aeonia
- Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth     Trousers. Map Link

- Location Stormveil Castle.    - Found at the room next to the dark one where Banished Knight is     located. You must use the secret back entrance that Gatekeeper Gostoc     suggests in order to reach the said room.

- Location: Stormveil Castle. Map Link    - Looted off a corpse that is located at the balcony of the inner     gatehouse of the castle's main gate. The safest way to reach this room is     by entering through the back of the castle since the enemies that are     guarding the main gate and the front won't expect you to be coming in from     behind.
- Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1500     Runes. Map Link.
- Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis
- The whole set is found in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind a     Boss: Crucible Knight Siluria. [Elden Ring Map here]
- Drops from Raya Lucarian Soldiers    - Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after     the Manor Lower Level site of grace.
- Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace     in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Map Link.
- Acquire this from the enemy directly up the hill from the site of     grace at the Village of the Albinaurics. He is the enemy who wields fire,     you may have to kill him a few times to get it.
- Defeat Witch-Hunter Jerren.
- Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah     Loux, Warrior.
- Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found     in a house in the northeast corner of the village. See it on the Elden     Ring Map here.
- Dropped by Castle Guards
- *Eye Surcoat* can be found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord     of Blasphemy Boss. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon     Fortissax.
- Found on Fia after progressing her questline and defeating Lichdragon     Fortissax.
- The *Fell Omen Cloak* Chest Armor can be purchased from Enia in the Roundtable     Hold after the player has defeated Morgott.
- Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run     past NPC invader to touch Grace first. [Map Link]
- Pieces of the Fire Monk armor set are dropped by Fire Monk Abbots     found at a few camps and patrols in Liurnia.
- Dropped by Ancestral Follower
- You can loot the entire *Gelmir Knight Set* in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon     from a Gelmir Knight corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- Dropped by Godrick Knights
- Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of     Caelid.
- Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost
- Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located     throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.
- Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

- All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's     Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.    - Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing     through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops     of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. [Map Link]

- Collect the Resurrection Painting from the Artist's Shack in eastern     Liurnia. [Elden Ring Map Link]    - With the painting on hand, head to the graveyard area east of Caria     Manor. This location is only accessible after completing the manor and     defeating Royal Knight Loretta. The item is found by touching a ghost     sitting on a chair at the graveyard. The ghost disappears as soon as you     touch it and the Juvenile Scholar Robe will appear on the ground along with     a Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1 x Larval Tear. [Elden Ring Map Link]
- Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  4,500 Runes.
- Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found     in Limgrave.
- Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.    - Sold by Isolated Merchant Dragonburrow for 1,500 Runes.
- Chance to drop from regular Soldier enemies found in Leyndell, Royal     Capital.
-        - Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church        grace in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Map Link.
- Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and     a Giant Poison Flower. Map Link

- The Noble's Traveling Garb along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can     be found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of     corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women. See it on the Elden     Ring Map here.

- All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat     enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the     roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from     other Aristocrats.
- Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.
- Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.
- The *Queen's Robe* can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for     10,000     Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.
-  Can be found at Gatefront Ruins.
- Found in Stillwater Cave, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack     you when you take it.
- Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping     Peninsula, for  2400 Runes. Map Link.
- Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.
- Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the     Giants
- Dropeed by Marionette Soldier fought at Witchbane Ruins. Map Link.

- The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the     All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell,     Capital of Ash, an alternate version of the *Royal Capital* accessible     only after making significant progress in the story. [Map Link]
- Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal     Capital. Map Link
- Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes     for   1000 Runes. Map Link.

- After completing Sorceress Sellen's Questline and siding with her     towards the end, return to Primeval Sorecerer Azur's location. *Azur's     Glintstone Manchettes* will be on the floor where Azur used to be, along     with the rest of the set.
- Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class.

- Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will     eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set     with an altered version of the chest piece. See the location on the Elden     Ring Map here.
- Can be found on a corpse under an archway behind Ordina, Liturgical     Town in Consecrated Grounds. See map location.
- Drop from Blackflame monks
- Drops in Gelmir Hero's Grave - Mt. Gelmir. [Elden Ring Interactive Map     Link]
- Looted from a corpse in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds near the     Underground Roadside site of grace.
- Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer     of the Briar in The Shaded Castle
- Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano     Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Map Link

- You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy    - To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to     the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section,     specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the     gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform     that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of     Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick     up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.
- Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal. It     costs  1000 Runes. Map Link.
- Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,000     Runes. Map Link.
- Can be found at Inner Aeonia.
- Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000     Runes. Map Link.

- Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis, located at Auriza Hero's Grave. Map     Link    - Found with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind     a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria
metadata.effects: Strengthen Aspects of the Crucible incantations.

metadata.location: - Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah     Loux, Warrior.
- Drop from Castle Guard.
- Looted off a corpse in Hermit Village, Mt. Gelmir. The corpse is found     in a house in the northeast corner of the village.
- Obtained when defeating the Fire Monk Abbot, leader of the camp. Map     Link.
- Dropped by a Soldier located in a small camp near bridge located north     of Limgrave lake. Map Link
- You can loot the entire *Gelmir Knight Set* in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon     from a *Gelmir Knight* corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- Fort Haight.  Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort     walls. Map Link.
- Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of     Caelid.
- Haligtree Soldiers drop all pieces of the set. They are located     throughout all areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. Map Link
- Dropped by the Bandits found in Murkwater Cave.

- All pieces of Hoslow's Set are dropped by Juno Hoslow along with Hoslow's     Petal Whip as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline.    - Juno Hoslow is a Hostile NPC that you can invade after progressing     through the questline. His invade rune be found in the northern Mountaintops     of the Giants, east of Shack of the Lofty. [Map Link]
- Dropped by Northern Mercenaries and Mounted Northern Mercenaries found     in Limgrave.
- Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for  3,000 Runes.
- Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class.
- Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.    - Chance to drop from Leyndell Knights encountered in Leyndell, Royal     Capital. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
- May drop from Knights in Leyndell Royal Capital. Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link.
- Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace     in Leyndell, Royal Capital
- Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula.
- Bought from the Palm Reader in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh,     the Black Blade.
- Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and     a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- The *Noble's Gloves* along with other pieces of the Noble's Set can be     found at East Windmill Pasture, Altus Plateau, in a burning pile of     corpses surrounded by a circle of dancing women.
- Dropped by an Omenkiller enemy at Perfumer's Ruins, together with Omenkiller     Robe and Omenkiller Boots. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping     Peninsula, for  1500 Runes. Map Link.
- Chance to drop from Perfumer enemies encountered in Leyndell, Royal     Capital. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
- Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of     Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- *Queen's Bracelets* can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for     7,000     Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.
- The *Radahn's Gauntlets *Armor Gauntlets can be purchased from Eniaat     the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge Radahn has been     defeated.

- Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter     from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with     assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On     successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. Elden     Ring Interactive Map Link
- Can be dropped by Raya Lucaria Knights    - Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after     the Manor Lower Level site of grace.
- Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano     Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.
- On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops     of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. [Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link]
- Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter    - Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.
- Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class.    - Can be purchased from Nomadic Merchant for 400 Runes. Normadic is     located in: Limgrave, Dissenter's Cave
- Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.    - Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the     Giants for 1,000  Runes. [Map Link]
- Can be purchased from Finger Reader Enia after killing Commander Niall     at Castle Sol Rooftop.
- In Caelid, there's a small group of enemies near a tree at the     northeastern part of the region. Another enemy in that group drops Vulgar     Militia Helm. Map Link

- Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a     corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor     and White Reed Greaves can also be found on this corpse. [Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link]
- Dropped by the Ancient Hero of Zamor fought at the Mountaintops of the     Giants
- Dropped from the Banished Knights in Stormveil Castle.
- This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.    - One can be found in Altus Plateau, East of the West Windmill Pasture.     He is on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

- Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring,     return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in     front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and     defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, *Blaidd's Gauntlets*,     and Blaidd's Greaves (as well as the Royal Greatsword).

- Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as     well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.    - One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the     Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.
- Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo     Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of     grace.
- The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved     Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle

- You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.    - Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the     opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside     onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver.     Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go     Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.

- This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter     Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline.     Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya     Lucaria Academy.
- Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon     defeat. [Map Link]
- Dropped by Fire Prelates.    - One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.    - One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.
- Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldiers patrolling the outpost
- Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

- Gold Bracelets can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion of Brother     Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site of grace and     go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go past the plant     enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask. Look the rune     from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of his set on his     body.
- Location go here.

- Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from the Erdtree Guardians that     are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.    - An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow     Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor     Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from     the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.
- Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight     Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter     areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.
- Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for     mercy.
- Location go here
- Location Go here

- Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be     found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.    - An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site     of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum     Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.

- Mausoleum Knight Set pieces are dropped by Mausoleum Knights,     typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is     directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset     quickly with the site of grace.

- You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield:     From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest     and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's     Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient     Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map
- Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in     Nokron and Nokstella.
- The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the     Subterranean Shunning Grounds at the Leyndell Capital
- Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large numbers     around Fort Gael.
- Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Elden Ring Interactive     Map Link.
- Acquired by following Yura's questline.
- Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after     defeating Royal Knight Lorreta for  4000.

- Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the     Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel     back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after     beating him.
metadata.effects: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.

metadata.location: - Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.

- Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street     of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's     Set. See the location in our interactive map here.

- Just before fighting Malenia, at the Haligtree Roots site of grace in Elphael,     Brace of the Haligtree, there is a side room with a large blooming red     flower. Melina's Set pieces are looted in front of the flower.
- See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.

- Dropped by one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in the     Mogwhyn Dynasty section of the Siofra River, Northwest of the Palace     Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled forest.

- The entire All-Knowing Set is dropped by Sir Gideon Ofnir, the     All-Knowing upon defeat. Sir Gideon is encountered as a boss in Leyndell,     Capital of Ash, a alternate version of the *Royal Capital* accessible     only after making significant progress in the story. [Map Link]
- Found at the lower level of the Fortified Manor at Leyendell Royal     Capital. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
- Starting Equipment for the Astrologer Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Liurnia of the Lakes     for   1000 Runes. Map Link.
- Starting Equipment for the Bandit Class
- Stormveil Castle: Chacen for it to be looted off the Banished Knight     enemies that you've killed.

- Drops from Knight Bernahl upon death. If not killed before, he will     eventually invade you at Crumbling Farum Azula, dropping the entire set     with an altered version of the chest piece. See the location on the Elden     Ring Map here.

- Drop from Blackflame Monks

- Purchased from the Palm Reader in Roundtable Hold after defeating Elemer     of the Briar in The Shaded Castle.
- Can be found after killing Patches' assassination target for the Volcano     Manor, Great Horned Tragoth. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- Starting Equipment for the Hero Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in south Caelid for  1,000     Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

- You can find the Carian Knight Set in Raya Lucaria Academy    - To find the Carian Knight Set, you will need to fast travel back to     the Church of the Cuckoo site and head to the graveyard section,     specifically where the large rotating lift is. On the right side of the     gate's entrance, look down as you are hugging the wall to find a platform     that you can drop to. Walk on the narrow path and you'll notice a group of     Glintstone Zombies worshipping a statue, simply kill the enemies and pick     up the glowing item next to the statue to receive the set.

- Can be found at Church of Elleh, purchased from Merchant Kal. It     costs  1000 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.    - Can be purchased from Twin Maiden Husks at the Roundtable Hold after     giving them Kale's Bell Bearing
- Dropped by Cleanrot Knight enemies. Found in places such as: Consecrated     Snowfield Catacombs and Miquella's Haligtree    - Can be found at Inner Aeonia
- Found at the chest located at the end of Murkwater Cave, alongside Cloth     Garb. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- Can drop from Commoner enemies in Stormveil Castle.
- Starting Equipment for the Confessor Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Mt. Gelmir for  1000     Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

- Can be purchased from Hermit Merchant at Hermit Merchant's Shack for      1,500 Runes.    - Looted from the corpse of Tanith after attacking her and defeating the     summoned Tannith's Knight near the *Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy* site of     grace in Volcano Manor, Altus Plateau.

- Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis at Auriza Hero's Grave. Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link    - Found with the Crucible Tree Set in a chest within Deeproot Depths behind     a mini-boss: Crucible Knight Siluria    -

- This armor piece is obtained as part of a set after the defeat of Witch-Hunter     Jerren. This could be done as part of Sorceress Sellen's questline.     Players will be given the option to side with Sellen or Jerren in Raya     Lucaria Academy.
- Available from Enia after defeating Godfrey, First Elden Lord and Hoarah     Loux, Warrior.

- Can be found inside Church of Inhibition directly beside a Grace. Run     past NPC invader to touch Grace first. [Elden Ring Interactive Map Link]

- Pieces of the Fire Monk Set are dropped by Fire Monks found in camps     in western Liurnia of the Lakes, around Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir, and     around Guardians' Garrison in the Mountaintop of the Giants.
- Dropped by Foot Soldier-type Soldier enemies. Defeat a Foot Soldier to     gain a chance to obtain this item. Foot Soldiers can be found protecting     the Purified Ruins.
- Can be found at Siofra River.
- You can loot the entire *Gelmir Knight Set* in the Gelmir Hero's Grave dungeon     from a *Gelmir Knight* corpse. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.

- Gatefront Ruins. Dropped by the heavy Godrick Knight patrolling the     outpost. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.    - Fort Haight.  Chance to drop from the Godrick Knight atop the fort     walls. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.
- Defeating Godskin Apostle, located at the bottom of Divine Tower of     Caelid.

- Guardian Set pieces can be acquired as drops from Erdtree Guardians that     are found near Minor Erdtrees in the Lands Between.    - An area dense with Guardians can be found by starting at the Dragonbarrow     Fork site of grace, and working your way uphill towards the Minor     Erdtree. Guardians are encountered in small groups and more come up from     the ground, making it a good place to farm the set.

- Starting Equipment for the Samurai Class    - Sold by the Isolated Merchant in Dragonbarrow for 1,000  Runes. [Elden     Ring Interactive Map Link]
- Can be bought from the Nomadic Merchant at the eastern side of Weeping     Peninsula, for  1500 Runes. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

- Dropped by the Draconic Tree Sentinel in Crumbling Farum Azula
- Bought from the Palm Reader in the Roundtable Hold after defeating Maliketh,     the Black Blade.
- Found in a cavern in Seethewater Cave filled with mushroom people and     a Giant Poison Flower. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- *Noble's Trousers* is a piece of the Noble's Set.    - The rest of the set is composed by the Navy Hood, Noble's Traveling     Garb, and Noble's Gloves.
- The rest of the set is composed by the Omensmirk Mask, Omenkiller Robe,     and Omenkiller Long Gloves.
- *Queen's Leggings* can be purchased to Enia in Roundtable Hold for     7,000     Need to defeat Rennala, Queen of the Full Moon Bossfight first.
- Leyndell Royal Capital: Dropped by an assassin inside the room located     below the balcony stairs. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- Found on Seluvis's body in Seluvis's Rise after reaching the end of     Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- Starting Equipment for the Prisoner Class.    - Can be purchased from the Nomadic Merchant in Ainsel River for  1000     Runes. Map Link.
- Starting Equipment for the Prophet Class.    - Can be purchased from Nomadic Merchant for 400 Runes. Normadic is     located in: Limgrave, Dissenter's Cave
- Can be purchased from Enia at the Roundtable Hold for 8,000 runes once Starscourge     Radahn has been defeated.
- Chace to drop from Radahn Soldiers, easily found in large     numbers around Fort Gael. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link.

- Leyndell, Royal Capital. After obtaining the second to last letter     from Volcano Manor, you will be sent to assist Knight Bernahl with     assassinating Vargram the Raging Wolf and Errant Sorcerer Wilhelm. On     successful invasion, you will receive the full Raging Wolf Set. Elden     Ring Interactive Map Link
- Dropped by Raya Lucarian Soldiers    - Easily farmed from the Phantom Raya Lucarian Soldiers in Carian Manor after     the Manor Lower Level site of grace.

- The *Rotten Duelist Greaves* Leg Armor can be found by killing a Rotten     Duelist that's facing the cliff edge located a little northwest of Ordina,     Liturgical Town which is located in the northern part of the Consecrated     Snowfields. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

- Can be found in Stillwater Cave - Liurnia of the Lakes, just ahead and     below the Lake Facing Cliffs, it's all sitting on a poison submerged     corpse near the end, guarded by an Giant Bats that will attack you when     you take it. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link

- The entire Noble Robe Set is dropped by Sanguine Noble NPC invasion in     west Mountaintops of The Giants. Includes Sanguine Noble Hood, Sanguine     Noble Robe and Sanguine Noble Waistcloth. See it on the Elden Ring Map     here.
- Can be found after killing the first assassination target for the Volcano     Manor, Old Knight Istvan. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- Found in a chest on the upper floor of Renna's Rise after reaching the     end of Ranni's questline. Elden Ring Interactive Map Link
- They are dropped by Raya Lucaria Sorcerers in Raya Lucaria Academy.

- Found in a corpse in one of the corners of the buildings within Street     of Sages Ruins, in Caelid's Swamp area, alongside the entire Traveler's     Set. See the location in our interactive map here.
- On a corpse inside the Shack of The Lofty in the northern Mountaintops     of the Giants. The rest of the set can also be looted here. [Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link]
- Earliest location: Limgrave East upon killing D Hunter    - Obtained at end of D Hunter's questline.
- Starting Equipment for the Warrior Class     - Can be purchased from Nomadic Merchant for 400 Runes. Normadic is     located in: Limgrave, Dissenter's Cave
- Starting Equipment for the Vagabond Class.    - Sold by the Nomadic Merchant located in eastern Mountaintops of the     Giants for 1,000  Runes. [Elden Ring Interactive Map Link]
- Can be bought from Finger Reader Enia at Roundtable Hold after     defeating Commander Niall

- Spiritcaller's Cave in the Mountaintops of the Giants: Found on a     corpse in a long cavern filled with spirit wolves. The White Reed Armor     and White Reed Gauntlets can also be found on this corpse. [Elden Ring     Interactive Map Link]
- Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave: The entire Zamor Set is dropped by the Ancient     Hero of Zamor fought at the end of this dungeon. [Elden Ring Interactive     Map Link]

- You can find the Drake Knight Set in Crumbling Farum Azula.    - Travel to the Beside The Great Bridge site of grace and go in the     opposite direction of the boss room. Go through the building and outside     onto the balcony. From here drop down to the Beastman with the big cleaver.     Go along the bridge and call up the elevator. Ride the Elevator down and go     Outside. The Drake Knight Set is on the left in a big chest.
- The *Perfumer Sarong* can be looted from perfumers found through Leyndell,     Royal Capital.
- Roundtable Hold - Drops from Rogier.
- Acquired by following Yura's questline.

- Following Ranni's questline, after she is given the Dark Moon Ring,     return to Ranni's Rise and you will hear Blaidd talking to himself in     front of the tower. When he finishes his dialogue he will turn hostile, and     defeating him will grant the player Blaidd's Armor, Blaidd's Gauntlets,     and *Blaidd's Greaves* (as well as the Royal Greatsword).

- You can find the Night's Cavalry Set within the Consecrated Snowfield:     From the Inner Consecrated Snowfield site of grace at night, look southwest     and there will be a caravan being pulled by two giants and two Night's     Cavalry escorts. Kill both the escorts to receive the armor alongside an Ancient     Dragon Smithing Stone. See the location in the Elden Ring Map

- Albinauric Wolfback Archers found in the Consecrated Snowfield, as     well as the Ordina Gaol, drop the Blue Silver Set pieces.    - One that is easily farmed can be found shortly north of the     Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

- In the hidden tunnels behind the altar in Mohg, the Omen's boss room     at the Cathedral of the Forsaken Site of Grace in the Subterranean     Shunning-Grounds below Leyndell, Royal Capital.    - After opening the secret passage behind the altar and taking the     stairs down, after crossing the narrow fallen rafter, directly to the left     is a tent and in the far corner you can find Nomadic Merchant's Chapeau and     the full Nomadic Merchant's Set.    - To get access to the set, you need to aggro the enemy walking around     close by and lead it next to the tent and have it use its frenzy attack to     break the tent.
- See the Tree Sentinel Set page for a guide on how to attain the set.
- Can be brought from Finger Reader Enia, at Roundtable Hold after     defeating Royal Knight Lorreta for  4000.
- Dropped from Nox Monk, Nox Swordstress, and Night Maiden enemies in     Nokron and Nokstella.
- The leggings can be looted off of the Ancestral Follower Shaman in the Ancestral     Woods area of Siofra River.

- The Duelist Set pieces can be dropped as loot from the Duelist enemies     located in Leyndell, Royal Capital.    - There is an apparent Colosseum on a hill in the southeast area of the     city that has two Duelists, one patrolling the path and one at the top.     Both of these enemies have a chance to drop all three pieces.
- Dropped by Fire Prelates.    - One can be found in Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir.    - One is in Guardians' Garrison in Mountaintop of the Giants.

- Dropped by Aristocrat Sorcerers seen in larger groups of Aristocrat enemies     that wander the roads of most areas.    - A group of three can be easily farmed in Kingsrealm Ruins near the Road     to the Manor site of grace. Turning around from where Iji's workstation     is, they are just beyond the gate that was formerly an illusory wall.    - Another spot is the traveling carriage escort on the roads north of     the Agheel Lake South site of grace.

- All pieces of the Old Aristocrat Set are dropped by the Old Aristocrat     enemies, often found within larger groups of Aristocrats wandering the     roads of most areas. The green cowl makes them easily distinguishable from     other Aristocrats.    - There are a number of Old Aristocrats within the caravan of enemies     north of the Agheel Lake South site of grace.    - Atlus Plateu - There are Old Aristocrats to the left of Gold Mask's     Bridge.
- Can be found around the Bestial Sanctum and Farum Greatbridge sites of     grace.
- Dropped by Godskin Noble Bossfight. See it on the Elden Ring Map here.
- The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved     Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.
- The Depraved Perfumer Set pieces can be farmed from the Depraved     Perfumer enemies located around The Shaded Castle.

- Dropped by killing one of three Nameless White Mask NPC invaders in     the Mohgwyn Dynasty Mausoleum area of Siofra River, northwest of the Palace     Approach Ledge-Road site of grace, in the blood filled lake. This one     can be found adjacent to the Giant Crow enemy near the blood filled lake     drop off.

- Upon attaining the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), Ensha of the     Royal Remains will invade the players world the next time they travel     back to Roundtable Hold. The full Royal Remains Set is acquired after     beating him.
metadata.effects: Slowly replenishes HP when HP is reduced.

metadata.location: - Purchased from Enia for 12,000 after defeating Malenia Blade of     Miquella.
- Lord Contender's Evergaol: Dropped by Roundtable Knight Vyke upon     defeat. [Map Link]
- The Omen set can be found after killing the Dung Eater in the     Subterranean Shunning Grounds at the Leyndell Capital

- This piece is dropped by Battlemage enemies.    - The entire Battlemage Set drops from a particular *Battlemage* enemy,     located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end     of the collapsed bridge. Elden Ring Map Link.

- Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree: The entire Traveler's Set is found     deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the     Haligtree Roots site of grace. [Elden Ring Map Link]

- *Gold Waistwrap* can be found on Goldmask's body after the completion     of Brother Corhyn's questline. Head south from the Capital of Ash site     of grace and go down the small path in the direction of the colosseum. Go     past the plant enemies and stick to the left and you will find Goldmask.     Look the rune from him, and reset the area and return to find the rest of     his set on his body.
- Murkwater Cave. Drops from Patches if he's killed after pleading for     mercy.
- Gatefront Ruins, dropped by Godrick Soldier patrolling the outpost
- This helm and other pieces of the Leyndell Soldier Set can be looted     as drops from the foot soldiers scattered around Altus Plateau, and Leyndell,     Royal Capital.

- Mausoleum Soldier Set pieces drop from Mausoleum Soldiers. They can be     found patrolling areas around some of the Wandering Mausoleums.    - An easy spot to farm this set is east of the East Gate Bridge Trestle site     of grace in Liurnia of the Lakes. Several groups of 3 or 4 Mausoleum     Soldiers are patrolling around this Wandering Mausoleum.
- Dropped from Raya Lucaria Academy Knights, also referred to as Cuckoo     Knights. There are three nearby to the East Raya Lucaria Gate site of     grace.
-  Dropped by Gold Dragon Cult Knights.
- Chance to drop from Radahn Knight in Fort Gael. Map Link.

- *Mausoleum Knight Set* pieces can be farmed from the Mausoleum Knights,     typically found in Liurnia of the Lakes. The easiest one to farm is     directly outside the Black Knife Catacombs entrance, which can be reset     quickly with the site of grace.    - Other possible locations include:     - Near the Weeping Peninsula Walking Mausoleum.
- Haligtree Knights drop the Haligtree Knight Armor, Haligtree Knight     Gauntlets, and Haligtree Knight Greaves. They can be found in the latter     areas of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.
